page.title: 19RECREATION
page.content: Apart from the USAF Base this is an area of few houses. The Base has a Youth Centre and football, basketball, baseball,tennis,etc. are played. Local foresters' interests are mainly out- door: ornithology, photography, P.T., and walking. Riding in the forest is by permit and deerstalking and shoot- ing are leased out. Poaching is not an official sport but certainly goes on! Local people have practical interests: car maintenance, fishing, gardening and apiary; other hobbies are poetry, goldpanning, folkdancing and singing, beachcombing and shadow puppets. Some help with Guides, Senior Citizens and the physically handicapped. In winter winemaking, reading and T.V. are popular. Most keep dogs who guard the more remote homes. One historian/actor provides a weekend retreat for com- posers and actors.
